Mojang already confirmed that the Warden is meant to be more of a force of nature than a boss mob. The Warden won't drop anything, not even xp, nor will it grant the player an advancement, to discourage players from fighting the Warden. (Sadly, Mojang failed to discourage, seeing as players will fight the Warden anyway just because it is hard to defeat.)

Although, since it has been speculated that the city center could be a portal, the Warden could drop a Tendril, which could be used to craft a Flint and Tendril, which can be used to activate the portal.

This is more important now since android 13 has patched accessing android/data through 3rd party file managers. This means there will be no way to backup your world without needing an external device or using annoying workarounds like wireless adb debugging.

A back slot would be very nice. While they have made it abundantly clear that they have no intention of removing elytra from the chest slot, a dedicated back slot that can be swapped to and from with a hot key would be cool for other applications. Players could put weapons, tools, or even a banner back there for cosmetic effect. Also, if they ever come out with backpacks or bundles, a back slot would make perfect sense for something that's meant to expand the player's inventory.
I Like This Idea, If Back Slot Was Added In Minecraft Backpack Can Be Added To The Minecraft Too
While I like this idea, if a player wears an elytra in the back slot it should not function. Also, you should be able to add two swords on your back.
